data.eml:eml: coral (Scleractinia, Poritidae) from the Gulf of Oman

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Claereboudt, Michel R., Al-Amri, Issa S. (2004): coral (Scleractinia, Poritidae) from the Gulf of Oman. Zootaxa 532: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157525
